summary: Use Kinect to play Skyrim (Work in Progress)
descriptionHtml:
PLEASE GIVE FEEDBACK.

-Description-
Allows user to use Microsoft Kinect to play skyrim.

-Requirements-
Microsoft Kinect
Microsoft Kinect SDK (http://www.kinectforwindows.org/download/)
FAAST (http://projects.ict.usc.edu/mxr/faast/)
VAC (http://www.dwvac.com/download.html)
Brekel All-in-one OpenNI Kinect Auto Installer

-Installation-
will improve tutorial after feedback, this is difficult.
(NOT noob friendly)
1. Install All-in-one OpenNI Kinect Auto Installer
2. Microsoft Kinect SDK (DRIVERS ONLY)
3. Now go to Device Manager --> Microsoft Kinect --> uninstall all EXCEPT Microsoft Kinect Audio Array Control (this allows usage of kinect mic)
4. scan for hardware changes in device manager
5. Install VAC without UAC or you will get an error
6. Import skyrim.xml in VAC
7. run FAAST, load skyrim.cfg.
8. READ THE README.TXT files.

Feel free to message me for any questions, comments, or concerns.

-Credits-
Everyone
credits in README.TXT
author: Anti087
